example.text: The Chinese Communist Party must be held accountable for its longstanding, horrific human rights violations. I helped introduce a bipartisan bill to sanction President Xi’s inner circle and send a strong message that the US condemns these atrocities. [[url]]

Passing the Law Enforcement De-escalation Act On Wednesday, I helped pass the bipartisan Law Enforcement De-escalation Training Act , vital legislation that will close the mental health crisis training gap and provide officers with de-escalation tactics for these urgent encounters. The bill passed the House and Senate with bipartisan support and will now be sent to President Biden for his signature.

It will also make important investments in domestic manufacturing that will further our national security, and support operations at the Pease Air National Guard Base. New Hampshire and our nation will be safer and stronger from these investments in our military, servicemembers, and veterans.

These programs have significantly reduced teen pregnancy and provided New Hampshire youth with education on reproductive health, sexually transmitted diseases, contraception, and more, and the Executive Council's misguided decision to block their funding strips Granite State parents of the opportunity to enroll their children in these health education programs. I will continue to advocate for funding for these critical sex education and pregnancy prevention programs in New Hampshire.

Strengthening Our National Security This week I voted to pass the bipartisan National Defense Authorization Act of 2023 , critical legislation which keeps Americans at home and abroad safe and secure. This year's authorization includes investments to raise our troops' pay, strengthen our alliances, and increase our global competitiveness.
